website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to keep multiple headsets safe and organized.
pros: The stand feels strong and stable, despite being made of plastic
There is a quality look and feel to the materials
The dual hooks make it easy to keep multiple headsets from getting tangled together
The bottom tray is a convenient spot for miscellaneous items like paperclips and extra cords
There's a hook on the back for additional wire management
cons: The large base of the Myguru takes up more space than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Get This!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dual holder! I have more headphones than I know what to do with & different types of holder's too but what set's this apart from the other's is the tray at the bottom, in case you have wired phones, it keeps them more organized along with a place to wrap or hang any type of related wires in the upright part of holder! I found that very useful! It's well made & ain't gonna kill your wallet. Assembly is very easy and comes with everything you need to do so! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and cleans some clutter up on my workstation
customer_reviews.text: The Stand holds two or one of my headphones with ease. It looks great and cleans some clutter up on my workstation. There are two trays at the base of the stand to hold little things like paper clips and such. There is also a place to hang a wire if you have a wired headset. I would recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Kinda big, quality not so great.. Might came scratched up already. It's fine but I might just hang it on my wall or something, kind of big for my clean desk area Update: not even 24hrs after setting it up, one of the screws broke off. I didn't even tighten them all the way.. Disappointed.. Returning it back.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to assemble. It’s pretty sturdy when the headsets are on it. Some comments said it tipped over when taking the headset off but I haven’t had a problem so idk if my headsets are just light but it works perfectly. The cord in the back is a nice touch since I have 2 headsets it makes it look nicer and organized when they’re sitting on my desk. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Beorn

customer_reviews.title: maybe a little bulky
customer_reviews.text: takes up too much room on the desk, but has nice cord organization and room to put little loose parts on the base. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle1

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but work
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty easy to put together but they did not come with instructions. I bought them for my second grade class and they are still intact after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Becca RSO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphone holder
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for two sets of headphones!!! Easy to put together too!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Trawicki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds both my headsets and keeps them from getting torn up and doesnt make dents in the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but came broken with screws stripped out. Slides around no rubber feet even with two headsets on it. Buyer beware you get what you pay for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie bocker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had it for a few months now and sits next to my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!! Item came broken and description said it was Aluminum and was actually plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Melendez

product_meta.title: Headphone Stand,Myguru Headset Stand Headphone Holder Mount Earphone Stand Universal Aluminum Headset Showing Display Hanger for All Size Wired Wireless Headphone (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackBuy One,Get Two.Aluminum Headset Stand and Wireless Charger.
It is super easy to bring along wherever you go - it's small, light, and most importantly, unique fashion style. 
The base integrates with QI wireless charger.While placed your headphone,the base built in QI wireless charging transmitter can support mobile phone wireless charging at any time.

Unique Features
The headphone stand and wireless charger was made of Top(TPU) + Pole(Aluminum) + Base(ABS),Easy assembly, easy to disassemble.

As a headphone holder ,suitable for most of headphones.

As a wireless charger ,compatible for: 
Direct Charging Models: (Work without any charging case / coil) Samsung Galaxy S7，S7 Edge， S6，S6 Edge，S6 Edge Plus，Note 5，Nexus 7 2nd Gen，Nexus 6/5/4，LG Optimus Vu2，Nokia Lumia 920， HTC 8X，HTC Droid DNA;
Requiring Charging Receiver: Galaxy S5 / S4 / S3，Galaxy Note 4/3/2，Nokia Lumia 820,925,925T，1020;LG G3 /G4; 
Charging case required: iPhone 7 / 7 Plus/iPhone 6s / 6s Plus，6/6 Plus，5 / 5S / 5C，4 / 4S

Wireless Charger specification:
1.Input：DC5V1.5A 
2.Power：5W
3.Charging current：5V500-1000mA
4.Charging distance：5mm-10mm
5.Charging efficiency：≥72%

Package content 
1x Headset Stand 
1x Manual 
1x USB Charging Cable
1x Ring Phone Stand
feature_bullets: Simple but useful design. The headphone stand used modular design, which of the top is concave design and used the soft TPU material,keeps your headphones away from spills, crushing and scratching.
The base integrates with QI wireless charger . While placed your headphone,the base built in QI wireless charging transmitter can support mobile phone wireless charging at any time.

As wireless charger ,compatible for: Direct Charging Models: (Work without any charging case / coil) Samsung Galaxy S7，S7 Edge， S6，S6 Edge，S6 Edge Plus，Note 5，Nexus 7 2nd Gen，Nexus 6/5/4，LG Optimus Vu2，Nokia Lumia 920， HTC 8X，HTC Droid DNA; Requiring Charging Receiver: Galaxy S5 / S4 / S3，Galaxy Note 4/3/2，Nokia Lumia 820,925,925T，1020;LG G3 /G4; Charging case required: iPhone 7 / 7 Plus/iPhone 6s / 6s Plus，6/6 Plus，5 / 5S / 5C，4 / 4S.
As a headphone holder,compatible for most headphones with a headband width within 1.97inch/5cm and device height within 9.44inch/24cm.
Headphone stand and cable holder . Give your headphones a stylish resting place and keep your workspace clean and organized.
